page.title: 03HOUSING
page.content: The houses are mainly owner occupied and range from Â£13.000- Â£80.000 in value. They are terraced, detached, semi-detached,cottages,bungalows,small rambling farmhouses and 2 or 3 storied blocks of flats. They vary greatly in shape,size and design. Some of the bungalows have been specially built for old age pensioners and are grouped together all within easy reach of help. In addition, each bungalow has an alarm in the event of an emergency.A paid warden is in charge of the bungalows.There are 2 local authority "children in care" homes, a Cheshire Home for the physically disabled, particularly those suffering from Multiple Sclerosis and several old peoples homes. Some of the new houses have been built on marshy ground interlaced with underground springs causing bad settlement.
